About

About

Milan Ondrašovič received his B.Sc. and M.Sc. degrees from the University of Žilina in applied informatics in 2017 and 2019, respectively. Both of his final theses heavily involved computer vision. As of 2021, he is pursuing a Ph.D. degree at the University of Žilina. His research topic is deep machine learning applied to visual object tracking.
